home.title: Welcome to React Lang
home.subtitle: Learn about the latest technologies in tech

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Explore the world of AI and machine learning
ai.content: Artificial Intelligence is the simulation of human intelligence by machines. It includes machine learning, deep learning, and natural language processing. Applications: recommendations, chatbots, predictive analysis, and intelligent automation.

cyber.title: Cyber Security
cyber.description: Protect your digital assets with modern security practices
cyber.content: Cyber Security protects systems, networks, and data against digital attacks. It involves firewalls, encryption, multi-factor authentication, and penetration testing. Essential for protecting sensitive information and maintaining business continuity.

cloud.title: Cloud Computing
cloud.description: Scale your applications with cloud infrastructure
cloud.content: Cloud computing allows you to run applications and store data on remote servers, accessible over the internet. Main providers: AWS, Azure, Google Cloud. Benefits: scalability, flexibility, reduced infrastructure costs, and high availability.

software.title: Software Development
software.description: Build robust applications with best practices
software.content: Software Development involves designing, coding, testing, and maintaining applications. Agile methodologies, design patterns, and clean architecture are fundamental. Popular languages: Python, JavaScript, Java, and C++.

data.title: Data Science
data.description: Analyze and visualize data for insights
data.content: Data Science combines statistics, programming, and business intelligence to extract insights from large volumes of data. Tools: Python, R, SQL, Power BI. Applications: predictive analysis, customer segmentation, and process optimization.
